text:
Hey,

*Feature request:*
Can we please get the option to vertically align the `TableCell` component?
When building complex data tables, this is a big limitation.

Current workaround is to build out the table using flex box, but using this approach you are not able to get the horizontal scroll on smaller screens, which just makes the extension unusable if it contains more than 2-3 columns.

Thanks!

ping <@U03FJQPSC0Y>

Hey again,

*Bug report:* 
When you are in an open Panel and trigger a CRM action (SEND_EMAIL for example), the email box is hidden behind the open panel.

Hi Erik! Thanks for your request. Can you tell me more about what kind of vertical alignment you'd like to have? What are you trying to accomplish? This will help us solve for your needs better.

Feel free to send any screenshots if that helps
So sorry about this. We're looking into it on our end

I want to be able to align the contents of a table cell vertically: top, middle, bottom. as i would be able to with a HTML table.

Imagine having one column with 6 lines of text and the next column have 1, I would like to be able to align the 1 line to the top, rather than middle. Makes sense?
I see what you mean. I will let you know if we have any updates on this front. Thank you for your feedback, this is very helpful :slightly_smiling_face:
